title: High Dependency on Communication Services Imports
description: In 2023, Namibia's service imports consisted of 86.19% communications, computer, and related services, indicating a significant reliance on these sectors.

title: Late Start for Lower Secondary Education
description: Namibia has one of the highest starting ages for lower secondary school at 14 years as of 2023, potentially impacting early educational development.

title: High Income Inequality
description: With a Gini index of 59.1 in 2015, Namibia ranks among the countries with the highest income inequality globally.

title: Concentration of Wealth Among Top Earners
description: In 2015, the top 20% of earners in Namibia held 63.7% of the income, highlighting significant wealth concentration.

title: Balanced Sex Ratio at Birth
description: Namibia's sex ratio at birth was 1.011 male births per female births in 2023, indicating a balanced gender ratio at birth.
